Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than the standard market price. For you, I am offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $120. This opportunity allows you to experience the benefits firsthand while enjoying a special discount. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your lifestyle with our top-tier product. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
